de.lambeck.pned.elements.util

Class NodeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.elements.util.NodeInfo

  • public class NodeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for messages with name and ID of nodes because the composition of the Strings depend on whether the node has a name or not.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      static java.lang.String getMessageStringNameAndId(INode node)
      Returns a uniform, comma separated String for messages containing the name and the ID of the specified INode.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageStringNameAndId

        public static java.lang.String getMessageStringNameAndId(INode node)
        Returns a uniform, comma separated String for messages containing the name and the ID of the specified INode.
        Parameters:
        node - The specified INode
        Returns:
        Null if node == null; a comma separated String with the name (if not "") and the ID of the node
